resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157998</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157998</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2222</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Motion of air molecules in response to sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Luftmoleküle in Erwiderung auf Ton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement des molécules d'air en réponse au 
bruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento de moléculas do ar em resposta ao som</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento delle molecole dell'aria in risposta al 
suono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση των μορίων αέρα σε απάντηση στον ήχο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de las moléculas del aire en respuesta
a sonido</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the motion of air molecules in response to a sound and an explanation of the waves which are produced as a result of this</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Bewegung der Luftmoleküle
in Erwiderung auf einen Ton und eine Erklärung der Wellen zeigt, die 
resultierend aus diesem produziert werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre le mouvement des 
molécules d'air en réponse à un bruit et à une explication des 
vagues qui sont produites en raison de ceci</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre o movimento de 
moléculas do ar em resposta a um som e a uma explanação das ondas 
que são produzidas em conseqüência desta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il movimento delle 
molecole dell'aria in risposta ad un suono e ad una spiegazione delle 
onde che sono prodotte come conseguenza di questa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει την κίνηση των μορίων 
αέρα σε απάντηση σε έναν ήχο και μια εξήγηση των κυμάτων που 
παράγονται ως αποτέλεσμα αυτού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra el movimiento de las 
moléculas del aire en respuesta a un sonido y a una explicación de 
las ondas que se producen como resultado de esto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">som</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">suono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sonido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
